nagni mata, old fort 
dharamshala, kangra, indora, chamba, dalhousie

Nurpur fort is old fort built by tomar rajputs, was destoyed in earth quake, only ruins remain... this fort has granite idol of lord krishna which mirabai used to worship, it was brought from chittorgarh in 17 century by raja jagat singh
Nurpuri shawls and silk is famous

value: Boor (a type of namkeen) is this place's speciality
all type of food is available
Kathgarh temple which is ancient temple 25 kms away.
